text:
Nestoria - Frontend Developer (JavaScript, Backbone.js, Grunt/Gulp, Unit Testing, CSS with media queries) (Local, London UK) (Visa possible) (£40,000 - £50,000)

We are a property search engine in nine countries and six languages, based in London.

We use Gulp, Bower, Backbone.js, Require.js. We do mobile-first design. We do serious A/B testing.

We have a team of 20 people total - you will be one of two front-end developers, which means you will have a lot of decision-making power.

Apply here: http://lokku.com/jobs/frontend-developer.html

Read more about us on our dev blog: http://devblog.nestoria.com/
